import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Fetch a specific financial institution"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/accounts/{account_id}/financial-institutions/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Retrieves details for the specified financial institution (bank account).


Deprecated. Use Addresses. Create an off-chain Address (ACH/Wire/RTP) and pass its `address_id` to Transfers. Plaid endpoints have moved to `/accounts/{account_id}/plaid/*`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"account_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"title":"Kusid","type":"string","format":"ksuid","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$","example":"2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57"},"description":"The ID of the account"},{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"title":"Kusid","type":"string","format":"ksuid","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$","example":"2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57"},"description":"The ID of the financial institution"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A financial institution object","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"title":"FinancialInstitution","type":"object","properties":{"id":{"title":"Kusid","type":"string","format":"ksuid","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$","example":"2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57"},"name":{"type":"string","example":"Business Checking Account"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["processing","active","archived"],"example":"active"},"bank_details":{"title":"Bank","type":"object","properties":{"owner":{"type":"string","example":"Jane Doe"},"account_number":{"type":"string","example":"1234567890"},"routing_number":{"type":"string","example":63108680},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the bank","example":"Example Bank"},"address":{"title":"AccountAddress","type":"object","properties":{"street_line_1":{"type":"string","example":"123 Main St"},"street_line_2":{"type":"string","example":"Apt C"},"city":{"type":"string","example":"Des Moines"},"state":{"type":"string","example":"Iowa"},"zip":{"type":"string","example":"12345"},"country":{"type":"string","example":"USA"}},"required":["street_line_1","city","state","zip","country"]},"account_type":{"type":"string","example":"checking"}},"required":["owner","account_number","routing_number","name","account_type"]}}}}}}}}
